response.original_title: ゲーメスト ビデオ VOL.10 ワールドヒーローズ２JET
response.overview: Game Master Video Vol. 10 World Heroes 2JET  Color / 70 min / Stereo / July 23, 1994  Shinseisha GV-010  We Make History!!  ☆Character Introduction  ・Hanzou  ・Fuma  ・Dragon  ・J. Khan  ・Rasputin  ・Jeanne  ・Brocken  ・Muscle Power  ・Captain Kidd  ・Eric  ・Ryoko  ・Shura  ・J. Maximum  ・Madman  ・Jack  ・Ryof  ☆The World is Waiting for Me: World Hero Super Martial Arts Tournament  ・Warrior Training Arc  ・Super Martial Arts Tournament Arc  ☆Just a Cow, But Still a Cow: Bonus Game  ☆Master This and You're a Hero: Combinations  ・Humiliation  ・Chasing  ☆My Rival? Me! Game Master Championship  ☆There's not much to say, just watch the JET Acrobatic Troupe  Narration: Masashi Saruwatari
response.title: GAMEST VIDEO VOL.10 -WORLD HEROES 2 JET
